name: Innuendo
description:
Hello everyone!

I have just finished the release of a test version of a casual game I've been working on, called 'Innuendo'. 

Innuendo is a casual game, where the player has to tap the icons that will appear according to the suggestion on top of the screen! The more cards the player hits, the more points he/she gets!
Beware, the suggestion is not always the same! Hit as many as you can before time runs out!

The game is fairly simple, and it is my first attempt at something like this. The game is currently available on the Play Store for the USA, Brazil and Australia, and here at itch.io as a web version.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.LeonardoCalil.Innuendo

https://leo-calil.itch.io/innuendo

I used some assets available from the community and hired a programmer to help me make the experience better.

I appreciate if you can test it out! You can also give me feedback as well through this link:

https://forms.office.com/r/w39Y2BK9Hh

Thank you!
